Row.Text: Write the Treaty of the Diadochi

As you learned from your time in the Fourth Grail War, your massive empire fell apart very shortly after your death, and the Hellenistic period was marked by bloody conflicts over who would gain control of your conquests. While you regret nothing about your life, you would be foolish to make the same mistake again now that you've been given a second chance. This treaty will clearly mark who will be sovereign of what territories in the event of your death.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Macedon [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must control at least 4 Cities from other Civilizations [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have at least 4 Somatophylakes [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Each currently owned Somatophylax will be granted a title from a conquered City, unless you control more Somatophylakes than you do conquered Cities, in which case they will receive titles until there are no conquered Cities left. Stationing a Somatophylax in its designated City will grant that City +15% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production and +25% [ICON_CULTURE] Culture. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The cost of acquiring Social Policies is reduced by 10%.
